A heavy smoker, she died from lung cancer on April 25, 2009.

The Special Bond Between Doris Day and Former Child Star and TV Son Todd Starke, Who Died Tragically
The Doris Day Show originally aired on CBS from 1968 to 1971 and remains one of the last great TV family sitcoms in history. The series is known for its various format changes over its original five-season run, while most of its cast has since passed away. That includes its lovely leading lady, who died in 2019. Most tragically, that also includes its youngest cast member Todd Starke, who died at only 21 in 1983. Day had shared a special bond with the young actor. This is the story.

Meet The Cuddly 7lb Young Dog Still Looking For His Forever Family
Sandy Paws Rescue Inc., a foster-based rescue in Massachusetts, is helping a special little dog named Wink find his perfect match. At just seven pounds – smaller than most cats – this one-year-old charmer is proving that the best things come in small packages, especially when they come with an oversized personality. After a previous adoption wasn't the right fit, Wink has returned to Sandy Paws Rescue with a clearer understanding of his ideal home environment.

Local Dog Rescue Reveals They're in Need of More Foster Homes
If you've ever considered opening your heart and home to a furry friend in need of a place to rest until they find their forever family, then Sandy Paws Rescue Inc. might be looking for you. The foster-based dog rescue located in Massachusetts recently shared with their community that they are in need of more folks to step up and become a foster home for their dogs in need. By becoming a foster pet parent, you can make a direct impact in saving lives while helping dogs transition to their permanent homes.

Local Rescue Introduces 12lb Little Dog Who Was Found On Streets Now Looking For Love
Sandy Paws Rescue Inc., a dedicated foster-based dog rescue in Massachusetts, recently introduced Cherry, a young, approximately one-year-old dog who has had a rough start to life and is now ready to find her forever home. Weighing in at only 12lbs, her journey began on the streets of rural Texas, where Cherry was discovered wandering alone while heavily pregnant. Fortunately, a compassionate foster parent stepped in, providing her with a safe haven to give birth and raise her puppies. "Now that her babies are growing and finding homes, it’s Cherry’s turn," explains Sandy Paws Rescue Inc.

Meet The Sweet Dog Saved From Euthanasia Now Looking For Love
In a story of second chances, a young dog named Mochi has made her way from the brink of euthanasia in Central Texas to waiting for her forever family to find her in New England. This one-year-old puppy is currently waiting to be adopted through Sandy Paws Rescue Inc., a foster-based dog rescue in Massachusetts. The rescue describes Mochi as "a sweet little gem of a dog, ready to steal your heart with her soft white fur, funny floppy ears, and the most adorable pink splotchy nose." This 40-pound beauty has quickly become known for her gentle demeanor and perpetually wagging tail, making her an ideal candidate for adoption.

Cream Cheese Chocolate Chip Cookies Melt In Your Mouth
These little cream cheese chocolate chip cookies are so tender and buttery that they literally melt in your mouth. "These cookies are wonderful. The flavor is warm and cozy with lots of vanilla and a slight tang from the cream cheese. I make them for large group events at my church periodically and they are very popular. I almost always increase the ratio of brown sugar to granulated sugar when I make cookies in order to increase the softness of the dough, but these are perfect because the cream cheese is so soft. At the same time, the chilled dough has plenty of structure and the cookies don't spread much. This is a terrific recipe." - Margaret.
